event: Sundiata defeats Sumanguru at Battle of Kirina, founding Mali Empire
commit_message: Initial commit: Mali Empire founded by Sundiata Keita

event: Sundiata establishes Manden Charter and empire structure
commit_message: Release: Constitutional framework and administrative system established

event: Reign of Mansa Musa I - peak of Mali's power and wealth
commit_message: Major release: Mali Empire reaches zenith under Mansa Musa

event: Mansa Musa's pilgrimage to Mecca - displays Mali's wealth
commit_message: Feature: Pilgrimage demonstrates Mali's economic and cultural influence

event: Construction begins on Djinguereber Mosque in Timbuktu
commit_message: Build: Major architectural and educational project initiated
Feature: International recognition through scholar visit

event: Tuareg conquest of Timbuktu temporarily weakens Mali control
commit_message: Security breach: Loss of control over major intellectual center
Major event: Territorial losses to expanding Songhai Empire

event: Moroccan invasion reduces Mali's power significantly
commit_message: Breaking change: Foreign invasion severely weakens empire

event: Mali Empire reduced to small kingdom, eventually absorbed
commit_message: Fork: Empire reduced to small kingdom with new political structure

event: Absorption of remaining Mali territory by other powers
commit_message: End of life: Last vestiges of Mali Empire disappear
